comments.body:
I know this is the way it used to be, but I, in my opinion prefer to test the whole string instead of the contains. Why? Because some other change can mess with the string title, or the formatting but not with the grepping you do here :)

So, an example here for describe that I really enjoy is from the `TestDescribeIngress` which actually tests the whole string and not only if the string contains something :)

WDYT?
Sounds good! will change that soon, I am going to be busy these few weeks
